His wife helps with the family's income too, as she and their older daughter sew the student uniforms for the community school.  
          
The money from the loan will be used for his agricultural work, as he has to hire other people to help him plant corn, to buy herbicides and fertilizers to obtain a good harvest and to face the responsibilities he has acquired.

His plan for the future is to keep working and serving God in the ministry he has been entrusted with, working hard to provide his daughters with a higher education.

loans.use: to hire other people to help him plant corn, to buy herbicides and fertilizers to obtain a good harvest and to face the responsibilities he has acquired.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flagstones and cement to renovate the house from the inside.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en: Amalia is 47 years old, married, and had three children. She is a hog raiser in their village. She hopes to improve her hogs' growth but she needs to sustain her hogs with feed and vaccines. She is now asking for additional capital of P4,000 to buy feed and vaccines for the hogs' sustenance. She hopes this loan will be given to her as additional capital for her hog raising business. She also promises to pay back her loan in full.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her hogs' sustenance.

loans.name: Nhóm 04 Thôn Lâm Hòa, Yên Mỹ Group

texts.en:
Mrs Lánh works in agriculture raising poultry and is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell.

Lánh is 49 years old and married with two children. She is the leader of a five-member group, the Nhóm 04 thôn Lâm Hòa, Yên Mỹ solidarity group. 

In 2012, Lánh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business and has so far successfully repaid six loans. She has been involved in her business for more than 10 years and the main hardship she faces is the lack of capital.

In the future, she hopes for her business to do well and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to buy more baby poultry to raise and sell

loans.name: 04 - Phố 6 - Quảng Thắng Group

texts.en:
Hương is 42 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

She operates a food stall, selling meat, and has been involved in this business for more than ten years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more meat to resell.

Hương is the group leader of the 04 - Phố 6 - Quảng Thắng solidarity group, which consists of four members. This is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
                                                                                              
With her business profit, Hương hopes for her children to find a good job, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more meat to resell

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina is 35 years old, married to a driver and blessed with two children. She's had a pig raising business for almost 11 years and earns a net income of 800 Philippines pesos (PHP) per piglet. This money is usually spent on her children's education. Due to insufficient capital for her business, she would like to take out a loan of 18,000 PHP to buy more pig feed and piglets to raise. She's hoping that her business will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: To buy pig feed and piglets to raise.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en: Chizi appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards. It also enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She is requesting a new loan to purchase wheat flour, bread, rice and milk for resale. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, bread, rice and milk for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy art crafts and clothes to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy children's clothes for the new season

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en: Ellen is a 44-year-old married mother with four children, living in Bundibugyo Uganda. She grows cocoa on a small scale and needs a loan to buy more cocoa to sell to her customers. She dreams of building a permanent house but is limited by her lack of funds and seasonality changes, as are all cocoa farmers due to the seasonal nature of the business.

loans.use: To buy more cocoa to sell

loans.name: Puertas Del Cielo Group

texts.es: Grupo integrado por tres socias, coordinado por la señora Graciela de 45 años de edad, acompañada posee una mini pulpería y venta de cosméticos que los distribuye en la comunidad el propósito de invertir en mercadería para ambos negocios como es azúcar, arroz, chiverías, Big Cola, pan, cremas corporales, perfumes para damas y caballeros, etc. Otra de las socias es la señora Stefany de 21 años de edad, comerciante de productos varios como es chinelas, mosquiteros, banano, mamones chino, granadilla, etc., y la señora María de 21 años de edad quien comercializa condimentos y helados en el mercado de la municipalidad
texts.en:
This group has three members and is coordinated by Graciela, who is 45 years old and in a relationship. She has a small grocery store and sells cosmetics that she distributes in the community. She aims to invest in merchandise for both businesses, such as sugar, rice, snack food, Big Cola, bread, body lotions, perfumes for women and men, etc. 

Stefany is another one of the members; she is 21 years old and sells a variety of products like flip-flops, mosquito netting, bananas, rambutan, passion fruit, etc. And 21-year-old María sells condiments and ice cream at the city market.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, snack food, Big Cola, bread, body lotions, perfumes for women and men, etc.

loans.name: Siba Sankar Shg Group

texts.en:
The women of the Siba Sankar Self-Help Group (SHG) are from a small village in Odisha, India. The group is composed of ten women, who earn their living by raising animals, such as cattle and chickens; selling milk; and cultivating and selling vegetables. They need additional capital to maintain, enhance or expand their businesses and decided to apply for a loan with People's Forum. They are excited and full of hope to begin this new loan with solid goals and dreams. 

Ribika is a 30-year-old married mother of two children, who are in school. In the picture, the lady standing with her hand raised is Ribika. She completed five years of formal education but, due to the poor economic condition of her family, had to leave her education behind. As with all the clients of People's Forum, Ribika realizes that education is a vital key to a successful future for her children. She shares that her business is running quite well and, because of its success, she will be able to register her children in a good school this year! Her husband shares the same goals for the children.

Ribika is engaged in vegetable cultivation, and she produces potatoes, tomatoes, onions, and seasonal vegetables. She is applying for her first loan with People's Forum. The requested funds will be used to purchase standard-quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for her vegetable cultivation.

On behalf of her colleagues, Ribika expresses gratitude and appreciation for the support from Kiva investors throughout the world, who lend such necessary and vital support.

loans.use: to purchase standard-quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for her vegetable cultivation.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a widowed mother of ten children, all of whom are adults. She owns a house that does not have either electricity or piped water.
 
Rose has operated a milk selling business at the market for the past twenty years, selling to passers-by and neighbours. She cites seasonality as the major challenge she faces in the business.

With this loan, she wants to buy gallons more milk for resale. She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to buy gallons of milk for resale.

loans.name: Juana Paula

texts.es: Juana Paula tiene 47 años de edad, es madre soltera de 4 hijos, de los cuales uno de ellos está casado, el resto ya son mayores de edad, pero aun viven con ella. Juana trabaja como conserje para una empresa de la ciudad. Ha ido mejorando su vivienda poco a poco, a través de pequeños créditos que su salario le permita pagar. El crédito solicitado será para instalar el servicio higiénico de su vivienda. Comprará materiales como tubo, bloques, cemento, inodoro. Su próximo plan es construir el muro perimetral de su vivienda.
texts.en: Juana Paula is 47 year old.  She is a single mother of four children; one of them is married and the rest are already adults, but still live with her. Juana works as a janitor for a company in the city.  She has gradually improved her life through the small loans that her salary permits her to pay.  She will use the loan she is requesting to install a bathroom in her home.  She will purchase materials such as pipes, blocks, cement, and a toilet.  Her next plan is to build a perimeter wall around her home.

loans.use: to build a bathroom in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy groceries (rice, corn) and condiments.

loans.name: Selina

texts.en:
This is Selina. She greatly appreciates Kiva lenders for financially supporting her with her previous loan. She has been in this business for years now, and it keeps on growing. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more stock of spare parts for her business. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of spare parts for her business.

loans.name: 02 - Phố 6 - Quảng Thắng Group

texts.en:
Tình is 62 years old and she is married with three children. She lives in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

She works in agriculture farming poultry, and has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is applying for a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future. 

This is Tình's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She is the leader of a four-member group, the 02 - Phố 6 - Quảng Thắng solidarity group.

In the future, Tình hopes for her children to find a good job, to travel for vacation within the country, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Mr. Joseph is an old client who has applied for a loan of UGX 2,000,000 to buy cows for his business. He is 54 years old and married with six children; three of whom attend school. His business is cattle trading and his customers are cattle traders. His business is located in Kitwe, Kyabugimbi, Igara, Bushenyi District. He is a hard-working man who works eight hours a day and six days a week. Joseph is faced with the challenge of competition but he is ready to overcome it through his hard work. He hopes to grow his business and become financially stable.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio de 58 años de edad, es padre de 5 hijos, de los cuales 3 a un viven con él.
 
Antonio trabaja también en la agricultura, para obtener los granos básicos para darle la seguridad alimentaria a su familia, pero su fuente de ingresos principal es de su empleo formal que posee desde hace 5 años. Trabajando como vigilante privado en una empresa atunera ubicada en el municipio. Sus horarios de trabajo son de 24 horas. Trabaja un día completo y descansa el día siguiente.
          

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para construir un cerco perimetral  en su casa, ya que se encuentra muy dañado, específicamente comprara arena, cemento, hierro y alambre y para cancelar a la persona que le realizara este trabajo.

Sus planes es seguir contando con el empleo para asegurar los ingresos de su familia y de esta forma también mejorar su vivienda y contar con los servicios básicos para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Antonio, age 58, is father of 5 children. Three of them still live with him.

Antonio has a second job in agriculture. With this he obtains staple grains that guaranty nourishment for his family. However, his main source of income comes from his formal employment, which he has had for the last 5 years. 

He is a private security guard at a tuna company located in the town. He works 24 hrs straight. He works a full day and rests the next day. 

The loan he is requesting from CREDICAMPO is to build a fence around his house, since the one he has right now is in bad conditions. He will buy sand, cement, iron, and wire, and pay for the labor. 

His plans are to keep his current job so he can have enough income for his family. Also, improve his house and have the basic services to give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, iron, wire, and pay for the labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy barbed wire and improve the fences

loans.name: Amy

texts.en:
This is Amy, 41, resident of Bacoor, Cavite in the Philippines. She is married to Carlos, who is a soldier and they have children. Together with her husband, Amy manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.  

Amy operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store that sells groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a 5 PHP amount of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns a profit by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

To help her continue operating her business, she is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Amy dreams for her business to grow bigger and hopes to have a better living. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Zakaliya

texts.en: Zakaliya is a 37-year-old married man with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is a farmer who mainly grows cocoa on a small scale. Due to very little returns and a high cost of living, he decided to go for working in the motorcycle transportation business to increase his household income and meet his daily family expenses. Zakaliya would like a loan to buy another motorcycle to realize more profits even though competition and weather changes are affecting his plans to expand his capital base.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Anzhela

texts.en:
Anzhela lives in Sevan city, which is in the Gegharkunik region. She is married and has a son. Anzhela has a vocational education with a specialty in cooking, but she never worked in her specialty. Anzhela rents a shop where she sells fruits and vegetables, and she has been running her own business for 10 years already. She buys from the local farmers several times in a week. 

Anzhela’s husband helps her business very much especially when they make purchases for their stall from the villagers. Anzhela is satisfied with her business as it is the only source of income for her cute family. In her stall she sells a great range of greens, zucchinis, radishes, cabbages, potatoes, cucumbers, tomatoes, beans and also sweet and colorful fruits such as apples, cherries, pears, oranges, etc.

Anzhela asks for a loan of 600,000 Armenian Drams because she wants to buy more fruit and enlarge her stall's assortment. She wants to gain more customers with her stall’s various and fresh assortment of fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy more fruit and gain more customers with her stall’s various and fresh assortment of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Gloria de 38 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudió hasta tercer grado, esta acompañada y tiene dos hijos de 15 y 18 años de los cuales una ya esta acompañada y la otra estudia; por lo tanto solo una depende de ella, Gloria se dedica a la siembra de maíz junto con su compañero de vida, desde hace 12 años oficio que aprendió de su padre quien toda su vida se dedico a la siembra de maíz, también trabaja como cocinera en el centro escolar de su comunidad.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para la compra de insumos agrícolas como Semilla, Abono, Fertilizantes y agroquímico para la siembra de 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, así lograra tener una buena cosecha para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
El sueño de Gloria es mejorar su vivienda, tener varios animales y sobre todo darle lo que pueda a su familia.
texts.en:
Gloria is a 38 year old housewife with a third grade education.  She is a common-law wife and has two children, 15 and 18; one is already a common-law wife and the other is a student and therefore, her only dependent.  Gloria and her lifetime companion have been engaged in planting corn together for twelve years.  She learned this trade from her father who dedicated all his life to planting corn.  She also works as a cook in her community’s school.

The loan she is requesting from CREDICAMPO is for the purchase of farming inputs such as seeds, manure, fertilizer, and agrochemicals to plant 14,000 square meters of corn and, in this way, she will manage to have a good harvest and provide her family with a better quality of life.  Gloria’s dream is to improve her home, have several animals and above all, provide her family with what she can.

loans.use: to purchase farming inputs such as seeds, manure, fertilizer, and agrochemicals to plant 14,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 54-year-old widow who supports a family of four children. She has been running an office supply store in combination with a local mobile money transfer business as an M-PESA Agent for a period of ten years, earning an income of 5,000 KES.

Mary is asking for her second loan of 30,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya. She intends to use this amount to stock new office supplies and add more capital to her local mobile money transfer business in order to meet her clients' needs. 

Mary plans to use the anticipated income to expand her current business and educate her children. She hopes to improve the living standard of her family and become a successful entrepreneur.

loans.use: to add new stock of office supplies and add capital for her local mobile money transfer business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires and tarp for his mototaxi.

loans.name: Guadalupe Dionicio

texts.es: El señor Guadalupe Dionicio es un microempresario emprendedor de 55 años de edad y acompañado, quien es propietario de una pulpería en su domicilio, el crédito lo solicita para invertir en granos básicos como es arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, carne de pollo, variedad de pastillas, etc., con los créditos anteriores el socio  logró ampliar el negocio, además que actualmente vende productos que antes no vendía, y esperas seguir progresando cada día mas para brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Guadalupe Dionicio is an enterprising micro entrepreneur. He is 55 years old and is in a relationship. He has a small grocery store in his home. He is requesting this loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, chicken and a variety of sweets. With previous loans he was able to increase the size of his business, and he is now able to sell products that he did not sell before. He hopes to continue making progress in his business each day to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, chicken and a variety of sweets.

loans.name: Salima

texts.en:
Salima is a 58-year-old married mother of three, whose husband works by selling clothes. She owns her own clothing shop where she also provides tailoring services - a skill she learned from working in a clothing factory before. Her shop faced some difficulties when she first opened it, but has since been able to grow and provide Salima with a steady income.

Salima is an ambitious woman who pursues every opportunity in effort to improve her business. She acquired a loan from Kiva’s Field Partner, Al Majmoua, in order to increase her current inventory of merchandise in big quantities. She would like to offer the merchandise at encouraging prices, especially for the summer collection, so that she can increase her sales and generate some extra revenue.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory of merchandise in big quantities.

loans.name: Maritza Marilu

texts.es:
Maritza de 30 años de edad, madre de dos hijos, no tubo la oportunidad de estudiar, ya que desde muy pequeña se dedico a trabajar. Ella se dedica al negocio de revender queso y hortalizas, sus hijos asisten a la escuela, para poder hacer SU negocio tiene que trasladarse desde un lugar a otro, ya que las ventas las realiza en la playa, algunos productos que comercializa son: pipianes, ejotes, queso y tamales, entre otros. 

El préstamo que esta soliictando, es para comprar lámina y madera, para reparar el techo de su casa.  El sueño de Maritza es que sus hijos se preparen académicamente y mejoren su estilo de vida.
texts.en: Maritza is 30 years old and has two children. She was not lucky enough to go to school because she had to start working at a very young age. She is a cheese and vegetables retailer. Her children go to school. She needs to travel a lot for her business, since she sells her products on the beach. Some of the items she sells are pipians, green beans, cheese, and tamales. She asks for a loan to buy metal sheets and wood in order to repair the roof of her house. Maritza's dream is to see her children succeed at school and have a better life.

loans.use: to buy the materials she needs to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Sabohat

texts.ru: Сабохат родилась в 1967 году. Она замужем и имеет 3 детей. Ее муж преподаватель. Сабохат и ее муж всегда стараются обеспечить своих детей хорошим условием проживания. Сабохат 3 года назад начала свой бизнес шитьем и продажей национальных матрасов как «курпача» и «курпа». Сабохат работает в ателье. Она также шьет национальные женские платья. Она хочет увеличить оборотный капитал и с такой целью она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки тканей. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sabohat was born in 1967. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a teacher. Sabohat and her husband always try to provide their children with a good standard of living. Three years ago she started a business sewing and selling traditional bed covers and mattresses as well as traditional women's dresses out of a workshop. She wants to increase her working capital and with this goal in mind has requested a loan of 2,000 somoni to buy fabric. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy fabric to increase her working capital

loans.name: Santos Mabel

texts.es:
Santos de 38 años de edad, madre de dos hijos, se encuentra casada, estudio hasta séptimo grado, se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, ya que sus hijos están pequeños y no pueden valerse de si mismos, su esposo es albañil, viven con ella su esposo, sus hijos y sus padres.

Santos posee una tienda de víveres y ropa, también se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos para venderlos en su casa, en el negocio se involucran unas primas y su esposo, el crédito sera utilizado en la compra de ropa y mercadería para surtir el negocio, el sueño de Santos es ver a sus hijos crecer, prepararlos academicamente, para que tengan un mejor futuro y puedan formarse una buena personalidad.
texts.en: Santos is 38 years old, married, and has two children. She went to school up to the seventh form. Since her children are too young to take care of themselves, she takes care of the household. Her husband is a bricklayer, and together they live with their children and their parents. Santos has a shop where she sells groceries and clothes. She also raises chickens and pigs and sells them at her house. She shares the shop with some cousins of hers and her husband. She will use the loan to buy clothes and basic grains to sell. Santos's dream is to see her children grow and succeed at school so that they can have a better future and become good persons.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
Armen lives with his small, nice family in a cute and comfortable city called Vanadzor, in Lori region. He is married and he has a son. The care of their son as well as the care of their house is Armen’s wife's duty. Armen is 23 years old and has been in the clothes-trading business for three years, already. At a rented stall at the city wholesale market, he sells a great range of men's clothes and some tissue. As he says, the number of his customers is not small, so his business brings enough income to provide for his young family's needs. He says his stall is greatly visited, because he always offers fashionable and nice clothes for men.

Armen needs this loan in order to buy and enlarge the assortment of his summer season clothes. Also, he wants to buy some sportswear connected with this period of World Cup Football. He hopes that among young people, his new products will be of great fame and demand.

loans.use: to buy and enlarge the assortment of his summer season clothes, and to buy sportswear connected with this period of World Cup Football

loans.name: Shodigul

texts.ru: Шодигул молодая замужняя девушка в возрасте 29 лет. Она вышла замуж рано. У нее уже имеется трое детей. Шодигул вместе с мужем воспитывают троих детей. Старшим сыновьям 12 и 11 лет. Маленькой дочке 4 годика. Шодигул не работала и следила за детьми. Теперь у нее много времени, и она может заниматься шитьем. Шодигул будет совмещать приятное с полезным. Она любит работать в сфере кройки и шитья женской одежды. Шодигул имеет швейную машинку, но она старая и хорошо не работает. Шодигул надеется получить кредит и купить современную швейную машинку. Она будет брать заказы на шитье одежды и за счет этого выплачивать кредит.
texts.en: Shodigul is a young woman, aged 29. She married young and already has three children. She and her husband are raising the three children. Her sons are 12 and 11 and her little daughter is 4. Shodigul did not used to work and watched the children, but she has a lot of time and is now able to sew. She will combine business and pleasure. She loves to cut and sew women's clothing. She has a sewing machine but it is old and does not work well. She needs to take out a loan to buy a modern sewing machine. She will take orders for clothing and use this income to repay the loan.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement blocks, cement, iron, gravel and other construction materials.

loans.name: Mariamu

texts.en:
This is Mariamu. She greatly appreciates Kiva lenders, for supporting her financially with her previous loan. She operates a fish- and fruit-and-vegetable-selling business.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more stock for her business, including fish, fruits and vegetables. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her business, including fish, fruits and vegetables for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chicks and chicken feed for fattening and resale to potential clients.

loans.name: Hermenegildo German

texts.es: Don Hermenegildo es un vendedor ambulante, vende en los mercados de la ciudad, bisuterías, y accesorios electrónicos. Es soltero, tiene 8 hijos, ya todos mayores de edad e independientes a él. Don Hermenegildo está solicitando el crédito para construir el muro perimetral de su vivienda, a lo largo de varios años ha ido mejorando su casa a través de crédito, y sus planes son lograr terminar por completo su vivienda, y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Durante el crédito anterior sufrió un asalto resultando herido, pero ya se está mejorando. Espera con el próximo crédito poder invertir en su negocio para aumentar la cantidad de inventario que actualmente tiene.
texts.en: Don Hermenegildo is a street vendor. He sells miscellaneous goods and electronic accessories in the city markets. He is single and has 8 children, all of whom are grown and independent from him. Don Hermenegildo is requesting the loan to build a perimeter wall for his home. Throughout several years he has been improving his house through loans, and his plans are to achieve the complete finish of his home, and in that way improve his quality of life. During the previous loan he suffered an assault resulting in injury, but now he is doing better. He hopes with the next loan to be able to invest in his business to expand the quantity of inventory that he currently has.

loans.use: to buy blocks, iron, cement, sand, and gravel.

loans.name: Roger Jose

texts.es: El señor Roger de 22 años de edad y acompañado, se dedica a la comercialización de productos varios en su comunidad y en los departamentos de Rivas, Masaya, es el primer ciclo que le socio solicita crédito y lo requiere para la compra de productos como es camisas, zapatos, toallas, shorts, etc., de esta manera le permitirá ampliar sus ganancias y brindarle mejor condiciones de vida a su familia
texts.en: Roger is 22 years old and is in a relationship. He works selling various products in his community and in the departments of Rivas and Masaya. This is his first loan with the field partner. He is requesting this loan to buy shirts, shoes, towels, shorts, etc. He hopes to increase his profits and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy shirts, shoes, towels, shorts, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Charity

texts.en:
Charity is 20 years old and lives in Gokwe South, Zimbabwe. She has been running a business selling poultry for over a year and a half. Over the past year, she has grown her business to a capacity of 80 birds every six weeks. When she is not tending to her business, Charity serves as a member of Cama, Camfed’s alumnae network. As a Cama member, she does volunteer work as a Learner Guide at the local secondary school.

With the requested Kiva loan, Charity will make bulk purchases of chicks, feed, saw dust, vaccines, broiler concentrate and maize, to improve production. With the additional profits she wishes to expand her business, to be able to supply local supermarkets.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, chick feed, and other poultry inputs

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Mr. Wilson is a longstanding client, aged 30 years. He is married and has seven children, aged 27, 25, 21, 19, 17, and 15 years. All of them attend school. His business is saucepan selling, which he started in 1993 in order to have income to sustain his family. His customers are all categories of people.

He has applied for a loan of UGX 4,000,000 (four million Uganda shillings). He will use this amount to buy more saucepans for the business. He is a hardworking man; he works 12 hours a day and 6 days a week. He also sells coffee and milk from his farm, to increase his income. His future plan is to educate all his children. He is faced with the challenge of competition from other business people of the same category, but he is determined to beat the competition through his hard work. He hopes to achieve his dreams when given a loan.

loans.use: To buy saucepans to sell

loans.name: Margarita Nohemí

texts.es:
La señora Margarita Nohemí, es madre soltera de 4 hijos de los cuales se encuentran en edad escolar, labora como Docente en una de los centros de estudio en la Ciudad de León desde hace 4 años, inicia sus labores desde las 08:00 am finalizando a las 05:00 pm de lunes a sábado, ella realiza este trabajo para llevar el sustento a su hogar.

Doña Margarita solicito este crédito a Ceprodel para la  compra de bloques, hierro cemento y piedrín, para la remodelación de su humilde vivienda, lo cual le permitirá mejorar su nivel de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Margarita Nohemí is a single mother of 4 school-aged children. She has worked as a teacher at one of the study centers in the city of León for 4 years. She starts her work at 8:00 a.m. and finishes at 5:00 p.m. from Monday through Saturday. She does this work to support her household.

Margarita asked Ceprodel for this loan to buy blocks, iron, cement, and gravel to remodel her humble house, which will allow her to improve the standard of living for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy blocks, iron, cement, and gravel

loans.name: Bassima

texts.en:
Along with her husband, 48-year-old Bassima owns a bakery that helps them cover the increasing financial demands of their family. Bassima quit school at an early age in order to pursue baking, a profession that was handed down from her mother. While the business struggled a bit at first, it has since been able to provide a steady income for Bassima and her husband. 

Bassima has always dreamt of growing her business, so she has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua in order to increase her current inventory of raw baking materials, purchases that will enable her to offer better pricing and quality. 

In the future, Bassima hopes to diversify her products and purchase the equipment necessary to produce sweets at her bakery, so that she can continue growing her successful business.

loans.use: To increase her inventory of raw baking materials.

loans.name: Yaneth De Los Angeles

texts.es: La señora Yaneth es una mujer emprendedora, soltera y de 49 años de edad, que se dedica a la elaboración de bisutería entregando en colegios y en el mercado más populoso de la capital, además trabaja como docente y de los ingresos ha logrado establecer el negocio desde hace cuatro años, la socia solicita el crédito para la compra de nylon, hilo elástico, pepas de maderas, pepas de vidrios, guaya, alambres, etc., la socia con los ingresos obtenidos de la ventas los destinara al negocio y otra parte para respaldar los gastos médicos que tiene.
texts.en: La señora Yaneth is an entrepreneurial woman, single, and 49 years old. She works in jewelry making, selling in schools and in the most populous market of the capital. In addition she works as a teacher and from the income she managed to establish the business four years ago. She requests the loan for the purchase of nylon, elastic thread, wood beads, glass beads, steel cable, wire, etc. With the obtained earnings from the sales, she will set them aside for the business and another part to support the medical expenses that she has.

loans.use: to buy nylon, elastic thread, wood beads, glass beads, steel cable, wire, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy doors and windows

loans.name: Tismayan Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario está integrado por cuatro socias laboriosas, lo coordina la señora Nimia de  53 años de edad y acompañada, se dedica  a la comercialización de leche, cuajada, ropa nueva y usada de manera ambulante inicio el negocio hace 32 años, y el crédito lo solicita para la compra de paca de brazier, ropa nueva, leche, cuajada, crema, pinol, pinolillo, etc. Las otras integrantes son la Señora Dania de 36 años de edad vende ropa nueva y usada de manera ambulante hace tres años, la señora Claudia de 24 años de edad comerciante de ropa de segunda desde hace 2 años, y Auxiliadora de 21 anos de edad comerciante de ropa en Tipitapa y Tisma.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is made up of four hardworking members. The coordinator is Nimia, who is 53 years old and is in a relationship. She works selling milk, cuajada [milk curd] and new and used clothing from place to place. She started her business 32 years ago. She is requesting this loan to buy packages of brassieres, new clothing, milk, cuajada, cream, pinol [flour made from toasted maize], pinolillo [a drink made from pinol], etc.

The other members of the group are Dania, who is 36 years old and has worked for three years selling new and used clothing from place to place; Claudia, who is 24 years old and has worked for two years selling secondhand clothing; and Auxiliadora, who is 21 years old and sells clothing in Tipitapa and Tisma.

loans.use: to buy packages of brassieres, new clothing, milk, cuajada [milk curd], cream, pinol [flour made from toasted maize], pinolillo [a drink made from pinol], etc. to sell.

loans.name: Mwaka

texts.en: Mwaka appreciates her previous Kiva loan, which improved her living standard. She is requesting another loan, to purchase more coconuts for resale. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase more coconuts for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay graduation fees

loans.name: Elba Francisca

texts.es:
La joven Elba Francisca, labora como ejecutiva de ventas en unas de las tiendas comerciales de la Ciudad de León desde hace 8 años, inicia sus labores desde las 08:30 am finalizando a las 06:30 pm como este mismo horario de lunes a domingo, ella realiza esta labor para llevar el sustento a su hogar.

La joven Elba, solicito este crédito a Ceprodel para la  compra de bloques, hierro, cemento y piedrín para la remodelación de su humilde vivienda, lo cual le permitirá mejorar su nivel de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Elba Francisca is a young woman who has worked as a sales executive in one of the commercial stores in the City of León for 8 years. She starts her work at 8:30 a.m. and finishes at 6:30 p.m. on the same schedule from Monday through Sunday. She does this work to support her household.

Elba asked for this loan from Ceprodel to buy blocks, iron, cement, and gravel to remodel her humble house, which will allow her to improve the standard of living for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy blocks, iron, cement, and gravel

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes appreciates her previous loan, which improved her living standards as it enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. Still preparing and selling food, she is requesting a new loan to buy more wheat flour, tomatoes, cooking oil, onions, maize flour, rice and sugar. 

Agnes thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy more wheat flour, tomatoes, cooking oil, onions, maize flour, rice and sugar

loans.name: Jehovah Shamah 2 Group

texts.en:
Meet the members of the Jehovah Shamah 2 group, who are from Chorkor-Accra, a city in Ghana. They are all local entrepreneurs who sell provisions, fried yams and fish. 

This marks their fourth loan from ID-Ghana, a partner of Kiva; they are requesting GHS 9,500 in total. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more sales, and consequently improve their living conditions. 

Regina is the featured leader of this group. The 63-year-old married businesswoman has two children who depend on the family. In business for 34 years, she sells fish. With her share of this loan, Regina will buy more wholesale fish from fisherman to sell to her customers. 

The group members will hold each other responsible for the repayment of the loan.

loans.use: To buy wholesale fish from fisherman to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Rosa Julia

texts.es:
Rosa de 29 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, esta casada y es madre de un hijo de 18 meses de edad, su esposo se dedica a la siembra de maíz (agricultor), mientras que ella se dedica a la venta de comida típica desde hace cuatro años, trabajo que lo aprendió de su abuela quien trabajaba desde hace mucho tiempo de eso. 

Para llegar a su trabajo Rosa camina media cuadra, trabaja en el horario de 1:00 pm a 6:00 pm. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para la compra de Maíz, leña, plátanos, yuca, bolsas, aceite, dulces de atado etc. para tener una mejor variedad de comida típica, así aumentaran lo clientes y debido a eso ella podrá obtener mejores ingresos para el sustento de su familia.

El sueño de Rosa es lograr pagar sin ningún inconveniente el crédito, ampliar el negocio de comida típica y mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Rosa, 29 years old, studied until the ninth grade. She is married and is the mother of an 18-month-old child. Her husband works in the sowing of corn (farmer), while she has worked in the sale of traditional food for the last four years. She learned this work from her grandmother who worked a long time ago in that.

Rosa walks half a block to get to work and works on a schedule of 1:00pm to 6:00pm.

The loan that she is requesting in CREDICAMPO is for the purchase of corn, firewood, banana, yucca, sacks, oil, sweets, etc. to have a better variety of traditional food. In that way she will expand her clientele and due to that she will also be able to obtain a better income to support her family.

Rosa’s dream is to achieve paying the loan without any issue, to grow the business of traditional food, and to improve her home.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, banana, yucca, sacks, oil, sweets, etc. to have a better variety of traditional food.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra está estudiando por la noche, y trabaja por la mañana y tarde, es una persona que se está esforzando para ser una profesional, y sentirse útil a la sociedad.
Sandra está estudiando la carrera de derecho, con lo que quiere, el día de mañana, abrir su propio estudio jurídico, y así servir a las demás personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus gastos de matrícula y de esa forma seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Sandra is studying at night and works in the morning and afternoon. She is a person who is making an effort to be a professional and feel useful to society.

Sandra is studying for a law degree, with which, in the future, she wants to start her own firm, and in this way serve others.

She is asking for this loan in order to be able to pay her tuition costs and in that way continue studying as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a new room in her house

loans.name: Mamour

texts.fr: Mamour est un homme qui est marié et père de famille. Il habite à coté du guichet et il est à son 5ème prêt. Ayant une expérience de 15 ans dans cette activité, il demande ce montant pour acheter et vendre des denrées alimentaires comme le sucre, l’huile, le lait, le savon. Il commence sa journée à 10h pour la terminer à 19h. Il prend en charge les charges des dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. A l’avenir il souhaite diversifier ses marchandises afin de pouvoir augmenter ses revenus et épargner de l’argent à coté. Ainsi il pourra construire sa maison  avec les bénéfices de son commerce.
texts.en:
Mamour is a father and a married man. He lives next to the loan office and this is his fifth loan. With fifteen year's experience, he is requesting this loan to enable him to trade foodstuffs such as sugar, oil and milk, as well as soap. His day begins at 10am and he finishes at 7pm. He covers the family's living expenses and his childrens' schooling fees. 
In the future, he hopes to diversify his merchandise in order to grow his sales and put some money aside. Then he'll be able to build his house with the profits from his business.

loans.use: to trade in foodstuffs such as rice, sugar, oil and sweets.

loans.name: Roberto Clemente

texts.es: Señor Roberto de 37 años de edad y casado se dedica a la comercialización de  leña en su comunidad, este negocio fue heredado por su suegro y lleva siete años administrándolo él, solicita el credito para la compra de marcas de leña (carretas, camiones), las ventas las efectúa al contado, estando al frente del negocio 7 años por su administración.
texts.en: Señor Roberto is 37 years old and married. He works in the commercialization of firewood in his community. This business was inherited from his father-in-law and he has run it for seven years. He requests the loan in order to buy firewood (carts, trucks). He carries out his sales in cash, and has run the administration of the business for seven years.

loans.use: to buy firewood.

loans.name: Karoli

texts.en:
Karoli, a 38-year-old man, used the previous loan to buy sugar, soap and soda to sell for income in Kagadi, Uganda. He earns extra income from selling produce. Despite being hardworking, he is challenged by limited client size and plans to have several rentals and commercial houses to increase his income sources.

Karoli intends to use the credit to buy bags of cement, crates of beer and soda, soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy bags of cement, crates of beer and soda, soap and sugar to sell

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis, a 60-year-old married man who lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda, used his previous loan to pay school fees for his children. Being the sole provider, he works hard so his family will enjoy a good standard of living. 

Francis mainly grows cocoa for sale, but unfavorable weather conditions and insufficient funds limit his returns. He is therefore requesting this loan to buy cocoa to sell to his customers.

loans.use: To buy cocoa to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her medical fees for the surgery she needs to undergo in the coming months.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cartons of fresh eggs to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corrugated metal roofing and purlins to replace the roof of her home.

loans.name: Sanovbar

texts.ru: Эту 49-летнюю жительницу района Рудаки зовут Сановбар. Она имеет свой малый бизнес, а именно она занимается производством и продажей мясных фаршов. Ее бизнес продвигается уже 5 лет. Сановбар помогают ее сыновья. А муж занимается продажей шаурмы на рынке. Сановбар сейчас думает о расширении бизнеса. Она хочет купить новое оборудование для измельчения мяса, в котором она так нуждается. Поэтому она обратилась за кредитом для покупки этого оборудования. Она ждет поддержки.
texts.en: Sanovbar is a 49-year-old resident of the Rudaki district. She has a small business producing and selling minced meat. Her business has been advancing for five years now. Her sons help her and her husband sells shwarma at the market. Sanovbar is currently thinking about expanding the business. She wants to buy the new equipment she needs for grinding meat. She applied for a loan to buy this equipment and is waiting for support.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for grinding meat

loans.name: Maa Brundabati Shg Group

texts.en:
Maa Brundabati Self Help Group is made up of 10 women from a small village of Odisha, India. All the members of this group are involved in different activities such as betel leaf cultivation, milk selling, paddy and vegetable cultivation, etc. They are very hardworking women with a willingness to learn new business trends. They all help and support each other. Whatever they are earning from their businesses is used for their monthly household expenses. 

One of the group members, Brundabati, is the president of this group. The lady standing with her hand raised in the photo is Brundabati. Brundabati is 30 years old and lives with her husband, parents-in-law and two children. She does betel leaf cultivation. She produces betel leaf and sells it at the market. Her husband is a farmer. Her husband helps Brundabati in betel leaf selling at the market. Brundabati is planning to buy standard-quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides so she can produce more betel leaf and increase her income. Brundabati, along with her group members, is asking for a loan of 150,000 INR to invest in their business activities. She will use her portion to purchase standard-quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for her betel leaf cultivation. She wants to construct a house for her family. She says, on the behalf of the group members, "Thank you, Kiva, for providing this opportunity for us!"

loans.use: to purchase standard-quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for her betel leaf cultivation.

loans.name: Alekha Mahima Shg Group

texts.en:
In 2013, 10 women from a small village in the Koraput district in Odisha stepped out and formed a group named Alekha Mahima SHG Self Help Group. They help each other, share their problems and solve them among themselves. They celebrate their festivals together in their village. 

One of the women from this group is Basanti (the lady standing with her hand raised). She is the leader of the group and she has 10 goats. She purchases the goat kids from the market and takes care of them. She provides vaccine and fodder to them when required. She sells them for meat to the local butcher shops when they grow. It takes eight to nine months for her to raise and sell them. She goes out in the morning to leave the goats graze in the fields and returns by noon. Then she cooks for her family. She resumes taking care of her goats by feeding them at home. Her husband assists her in selling and maintaining these goats. In this way, she is earning to improve her cash flow, which is not sufficient to manage her daily activities. She wants to enlarge her business, so she wants to purchase 10 more goats. In this way, she can earn a good amount after all expenditures in her business. She and her group members have requested a loan of 100,000 INR for her group so that they can all earn more and improve their families' cash flow.

loans.use: To purchase goats, fodder and vaccine

loans.name: Maa Laxmi Shg Group

texts.en:
The Maa Laxmi Self Help Group consists of nine members from a small village in the Koraput district, Odisha, India. All the members of this group are female. They are engaged in different business activities for the elimination of poverty. Three of the women have very low incomes, but this helps them to want to struggle harder to get ahead. All the members of this group are engaged in different activities to make some money.

One person who deserves to be highlighted is Namita (in the picture, the lady standing with her hand raised) who works selling vegetables. Through her job, she works to support her family, improve her business and continue growing. She is a very determined person who wants to continue growing. She is seeking part of this loan in order to be able to invest it in the purchase of vegetables like tomatoes, onions, green peppers, potatoes and other vegetables so that she can continue with her sales. The group is very grateful for this opportunity for growth that it is receiving.

loans.use: To purchase tomatoes, onions, green peppers, potatoes and other vegetables to sell

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah used the previous loan to buy crafts to sell. She has continued with her craft business in addition to decorating at parties, plus hiring out traditional items for traditional functions. She faces the challenges of competition and limited capital. However, she hopes to have all her children educated to higher levels of learning. Sarah has requested a loan to buy crafts to sell.

loans.use: to buy crafts to sell.

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo is a married woman with three school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family. 

For the past one year, she has operated a shop kiosk business, selling to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned price fluctuations as her major challenge. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the loan, she wants to purchase maize flour, sweets, bread, and eggs for resale. She decided to join Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, sweets, bread, and eggs for resale.

loans.name: Kate

texts.en:
Kate is a 53-year-old married lady with seven children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She deals in selling fresh foods, growing bananas and running a poultry business in order to boost her income. She faces the challenges of perishability of her products. However, she dreams of educating all her children to higher levels of learning.

Kate needs a loan to buy fresh food to sell.

loans.use: to buy fresh foods to sell.

loans.name: Reynaldo Raúl

texts.es:
Reynaldo de 29 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora, su nivel de  estudio solo fue hasta noveno, pues comenta que no quiso seguir estudiando porque él sabía bastante de albañilería y prefirió trabajar en lugar de estudiar.

 Actualmente está casado, es padre de un hijo de 3 años de edad, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos en su vivienda y cuidar de su hijo, la casa donde viven es de la mama de su esposa y la están remodelando, allí solo viven junto a su esposa y su hijo y son las únicas personas que dependen de él.  

Reynaldo es albañil, él se dedica a los trabajos de albañilería, cometa que tiene gran experiencia en el área de albañilería, él dice que  tiene aproximadamente 13 años de trabajar en la actividad, construye casas, pisos, muros  etc. Comenta que es un trabajo que le genera buenos ingresos económicos, es por esta razón que decidió dedicarse a esta actividad y que hoy en día tiene mucha clientela para trabajos, él sale fuera de su casa a realizar los trabajos siempre es necesario movilizarse a otros lugares para poder trabajar, él aprendió el trabajo cuando trabajaba de ayudante con su tío. Reynaldo,  también se dedica a la agricultura en la siembra de granos básicos maíz y fríjol. 

El préstamo lo utilizara para invertirlo en su vivienda donde están viviendo, pues por el transcurso del tiempo se ha deteriorado las paredes y por eso él quiere reforzar las paredes pues representan un peligro para su familia , específicamente comprara una camionada de arena, 2 quintales de hierro,  tejas de barro para el techo, pues era pequeño proyecto que tenían junto a su esposa de reparar la casa, estar más seguros y cómodos y que con la ayuda de Dios lo está logrando y también con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo.

Para el futuro Reynaldo desea mejorar su vivienda, construirla de bloque y cemento, pues la que tienen es de adobe y desea una de bloque, también  tener un mejor empleo que le facilite su vida y que le genere mejores ingresos económicos para su futura familia.
texts.en:
Reynaldo is 29 years old and is hardworking. He went to school until ninth grade. He says he did not want to continue studying because he already knew quite a bit about construction and he preferred to work instead of study.

He is married and has a three-year-old son. His wife looks after the household work and raising their son. The house in which they live was his wife's mother's, and they are in the process of fixing it up. Reynaldo lives there with his wife and son, and they are his only dependents.

Reynaldo works as a bricklayer. He says he has about 13 years of experience bricklaying. He builds houses, apartments, walls, etc. He says he makes a good income from this work, which is why he chose it, and that now he has many customers. He does his work at various sites, to which he needs to travel to do his work. He learned this work when he was working as an assistant to his uncle.

Reynaldo also works in agriculture, growing basic grains such as corn and beans.

He is requesting this loan to invest in his home. The walls have deteriorated over time, and he would like to reinforce them because they could be a danger to his family. Specifically, he will use the loan to buy a truckload of sand, 100 kilograms of iron, and clay tiles for the roof. He and his wife are working on fixing up their home so that they can be more secure and comfortable. Reynaldo says he is accomplishing this with God's help and a lot of effort and work.

In the future, Reynaldo would like to improve their home by building it with cement and blocks. Their current home is made of adobe, and he would like to build it with cement blocks. He would also like better work that would make his life easier and would improve his income for his growing family.

loans.use: to buy a truckload of sand, clay tiles and 100 kilograms of iron to repair his home.

loans.name: Willian Evidel

texts.es:
Wilian de 34 años de edad,  está acompañado tiene cinco hijos, su señora se dedica a los oficios domésticos, los cinco hijos aún viven con él. 

Willian se dedica a la agricultura, desde hace unos 20 años, su padre le enseño como ganarse la vida y fue entonces cuando dice que lo llevaba cada vez que él iba al terreno donde cosechaba. Willian también presta sus servicios cuando alguien lo busca para rajar leña y con eso dice que se ayuda bastante ya que sirve para la libra de azúcar, el terreno donde él cosecha le queda a unos diez minutos de su casa y su horario es de 6 de la mañana a 11 de la mañana,  sus hijos cuando pueden le ayudan a él.

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para pagar el alquiler de 7,000 metros cuadrados de terreno y también comprar 3 sacos de abono, y semilla. 
  
Willian dice que su sueño es siempre poder hacer su milpa y que sus hijos aprendan de ello, porque así como está la vida ellos se puedan defender cultivando y de eso pues poder vender y cubrir sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Willian is 34 years old and married with five children. His wife takes care of the housework and his five children still live with him. Willian began working in agriculture about 20 years ago. His father taught him how to earn a living and he says that he would take him everyday to the land where was working. Willian also loans out his services when someone seeks him out to split wood and he says that helps him a lot since it allows him to get a pound of sugar.

The field where he works is about 10 minutes from his house and his schedule is from 6 in the morning until 11 in the morning. His children help him when they can. The loan he is requesting through CREDICAMPO is to pay the rent on 7,000 square meters of land and to buy 3 sacks of fertilizer and seeds. Willian says that his dream has always been to be able to work his own land and that his children will learn to work it, because that's how life is. They can continue cultivating and, with this, they can sell their crops and cover their expenses.

loans.use: to pay to rent for 7,000 square meters of land and to buy three sacks of fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fabric and ready-to-wear dresses for women.

loans.name: Raed Group

texts.en:
Yasmine is the featured representative of the Raed group. She and the other members are best friends, which made them get together to acquire a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua.

Yasmine is a 34-year-old married mother of one whose husband is a carpenter. She has a university degree and has worked as a teacher for five years while also giving private tutoring lessons from her home. Yasmine is always thinking about ways to improve and grow her tutoring business, so she acquired a loan to renovate a room in her house in order to provide her students with a more productive learning environment. In the future she hopes to one day be able to afford to grow her business through establishing an education center. Yasmine is the lovely lady standing on the right. Nada is on the left and Rola is in the middle.

loans.use: To renovate a room in her house to provide her students with a more productive learning environment

loans.name: Ashot

texts.en:
Ashot is 45 years old and lives in Vanadzor city, which is in the Lori region. He graduated from Vanadzor State Architectural University in the construction department. Now he works at the Armenian State Architectural University at the Vanadzor branch and here he is a Head of the Department. He also has a small group of students who he helps to get ready with their diploma work. He is very respected and beloved in this university, and all his colleagues admire his knowledge and intellect.

Ashot is married and has two nice school-aged children. Ashot hopes to get this loan in order to buy a computer and some very important professional literature that was printed recently. It includes very useful information and informs about architectural know how around the world.

loans.use: to buy a computer and some very important professional literature

loans.name: Fe Ruina

texts.en:
Fe Ruina runs a general store in their village, aside from her video-k (video karaoke) entertainment business, to make a living. She earns well from this and had successfully repaid her previous loan used for buying grocery goods.

She wants to offer more, so that's why she took a new loan recently to purchase more grocery goods and bottled products to sell. She hopes to expand her business using the profit she earns from this loan, and to be able to send her children to school and finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery goods and bottled products to sell

loans.name: Marian

texts.es:
Marian está estudiando la carrera de Administración de Empresa y en sus días libres le ayuda a su tía en la venta de ropas.  Es una persona muy responsable y dedicada a sus estudios y a su familia, aspira a ser un buen profesional y seguir estudiando y servir a las personas.
Marian el día de mañana quiere ser una profesional útil a la sociedad y a las personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar las cuotas de su universidad. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Marian is studying business administration, and on her free days she helps her aunt selling clothing. She is a very responsible person and is dedicated to her studies and to her family. She aspires to be a professional and to continue studying and helping people.

In the future Marian wants to be a professional who helps people and society. She is requesting this loan to make university tuition payments. She is grateful for this opportunity that will help her very much.

loans.use: to make university tuition payments.

loans.name: Dephine

texts.en: Dephine is a 27-year-old businesswoman. She is married with two children and lives in the Shurugwi District of Zimbabwe with her family. For nine months now, she has been selling men’s and women’s clothing. She was encouraged by other Cama (Camfed’s alumni network) members to venture into business so that she could look after her family. During her spare time, Dephine volunteers as a Learner Guide delivering life skills education sessions to students in schools. With the requested loan, Dephine intends to purchase clothing in bulk from wholesalers at lower costs so that she can charge favorable prices and attract more customers. With more customers, her sales and profit levels will rise, enabling her to pay school fees for her children and remain financially independent.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in bulk from wholesalers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothing to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell to customers in the local markets.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.es:
Elisa esta esta estudiando la carrera de análisis de sistemas, es por medio de sus estudios que quiere poder ayudar a las personas y a sus seres queridos. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en pagar sus cuotas, lo que le fue de mucha ayuda para poder cubrir sus estudios.
Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, y de esa forma poder cubrir ese gasto que tiene. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo de poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en: Elisa is studying systems analysis. She hopes that through her studies she can help other people and her loved ones. She says she used her previous loan to make her tuition payments, which helped her a lot with financing her studies. She is requesting this loan to pay the fees associated with graduation and receiving her university degree. She is grateful for this opportunity and for being able to continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay the fees associated with graduation and receiving her university degree.

loans.name: Enid

texts.en:
Enid is a 38-year-old single Ugandan lady with 2 children. She used the previous loan to buy land. She sells fresh food and porridge as her business. From the local council, she gets some salary which acts as her additional income. She has been in this business for the last 5 years and her major aim was to support her family.

Enid needs a loan to buy stock of fresh foods like bananas and cabbages to sell. She dreams of buying land and even constructing a food store so that she could supply to all her clients. The major challenge affecting her farming is the ever-changing weather.

loans.use: to buy stock of fresh foods like bananas and cabbages to sell

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.en:
Eufemia previously accessed a 10,000 PHP loan that she used for the repair and maintenance of her stalls. (She has different stalls for rent.) Her earnings were a big help in their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan for the repair and maintenance of her stalls. Her profits from the business will definitely help her sustain her family's daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Eufemia hopes to have other sources of income to be able to buy her dream house. She dreams that her standard of living will improve. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the repair and maintenance of her stalls

loans.name: Adama

texts.fr: ADAMA est un promoteur qui évolue dans la commercialisation des fruits et légumes. Elle est mariée de mère de famille. Il est à son 3ème prêt et demande ce montant pour acheter et vendre des fruits et légumes. Elle a une expérience de 15 ans et commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 17h. A part ses frais médicaux, elle n’a pas de charges particulières car c’est son mari qui gère toutes les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille. A l’avenir elle voudrait ouvrir des boutiques de denrées alimentaires, afin de pouvoir diversifier ses produits et augmenter ses revenus. Grace à l’aide de l’institution, elle pourra épargner et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
ADAMA is a saleswoman who works trading fruit and vegetables. She is a married mother. This is her third loan and she is requesting this amount in order to buy and sell fruit and vegetables. She has fifteen year's experience, and begins her day at 9am and finishes at 5pm. Aside from her medical costs, she doesn't have any particular expenses as her husband is responsible for all the family's daily living expenditure.
In the future, she would like to open small shops selling foodstuffs in order to be able to diversify her product base and grow her sales. Thanks to the help from the institution, she will be able to save funds and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy and sell fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is an old client aged 32 years old. He has applied for a loan of 1,000,000 UGX (one million shillings only) to buy organic fertilizers for his tea farm. He is married with 4 children aged 10, 7, 3 and 1 year, and 2 attend school.

He is a farmer specializing in a tea plantation. He is a very hardworking man who works 8 hours a day and 5 days a week.  He started his business in the year 2009 to have an income to sustain his family. The business is being carried out from the Kanoni Kyamuhunga Igara Bushenyi District, and his clients are tea factories which have helped him to grow from one level to another.

He is faced with the challenge of poor weather, especially the dry season.  He hopes to grow his business and educate all his children with a continued financial boost. He is hard working.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers

loans.name: Martha Alcira

texts.es: Martha: Es originaria de Puerto Cabezas, casada con 4 hijos, dos menores de edad que estudian su primaria y los dos mayores de edad que están estudiando su carrera universitaria en una universidad del municipio. Su esposo, se dedica a la comercialización de la madera. Solicita financiamiento para realizarle estudios y análisis médicos a su hija en Managua. Su sueño es mejorar su vivienda y apoyar al desarrollo humano y profesional de sus hijos.
texts.en: Martha is a native of Puerto Cabezas. She is married and has four children. Her two youngest children are in elementary school, and her two oldest children are studying at a university in the municipality. Her husband works selling wood. She is requesting this loan to pay for some medical studies and analyses for her daughter in Managua. Her dream is to improve her house and to support her children's personal and professional development.

loans.use: to pay for some medical studies and analyses for her daughter in Managua.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine,an over sewing machine, and to renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon, 34, is a hardworking man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He earns a living for his family as a poultry farmer, although he also carries out agriculture to earn extra income. 

He was encouraged to start this business to earn more income for a better standard of living. He faces the challenges of chicken pox attacking his birds and inadequate capital to look after his chickens. He, however, has a vision of expanding his business to bigger markets.

He is requesting a loan to buy more chicks to add to his farm.

loans.use: to buy more chicks to add to his farm.

loans.name: Perla

texts.es:
Perla es estudiante de la carrera de enfermería, es una persona que se esta esforzando por poder salir adelante. Ella comenta que por medio de su préstamo anterior pudo cubrir sus gastos de tesis, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda, y pudo cubrir ese gasto.
Perla pide este nuevo préstamo para poder cubrir la totalidad de los gastos de su tesis, y de esa forma cubrir ese gasto que tiene y poder terminar tranquila sus estudios.
texts.en:
Perla es estudiante de la carrera de enfermería, es una persona que se esta esforzando por poder salir adelante. Ella comenta que por medio de su préstamo anterior pudo cubrir sus gastos de tesis, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda, y pudo cubrir ese gasto.
Perla pide este nuevo préstamo para poder cubrir la totalidad de los gastos de su tesis, y de esa forma cubrir ese gasto que tiene y poder terminar tranquila sus estudios.


Perla is a student in the nursing program. She is a a person who is making efforts to get ahead in life. She says that by means of her earlier loan she was able to cover the initial costs of her thesis, which was a great help and she was able to pay for that cost.

Perla is asking for this new loan to be able to cover the remaining expenses for her thesis, and in this way cover the expense that she has and be able to finish her studies without worries.

loans.use: to cover the total expenses of her thesis

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.en:
Gulsara was born in 1976. She is careful mother of a child. She is the only feed keeper of her child, because she is divorced, and her former husband doesn’t help her. 

Gulsara has been busy selling food items, such as candy, biscuits and chewing gum.  Her store is located on a street near a parking lot. She works every day to earn a living. She lives poorly. 

Gulsara manages her business alone, as her child is little. She is asking for a loan of 3,000 Tajikistani Somoni to buy food items to increase her working capital. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy food items to increase her working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers for resale

loans.name: Tito Benito

texts.es: Es un hombre trabajador y sociable, casado con 2 hijos mayores de edad. Desde hace aproximadamente 8 años habita en una casa de tambo y madera. Con el propósito de vivir de manera segura y digna, solicita financiamiento para construir su casa de concreto y comprar materiales de construcción: cemento, hierro, zinc, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es terminar la construcción de su vivienda de concreto.
texts.en: Tito Benito is hardworking and friendly. He is married with two adult children. For about eight years now he has lived in a stilt house made of wood. He is requesting this loan to buy construction materials such as cement, iron, corrugated metal roofing and nails and to pay for the labor to build a safer and better house made of concrete. His dream is to finish the construction of his concrete house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement, iron, corrugated metal roofing and nails and to pay for the labor to build a safer and better house made of concrete.

loans.name: Leonel Francisco

texts.es: Es originario de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 29 años de edad, casado, tiene un hijo de 9 años, que estudia su tercer grado de primaria. Desde hace muchos años habita en casa de sus padres. Con el objetivo de brindarle una vivienda propia y segura a su familia, solicita financiamiento para construir una vivienda de tambo de madera y comprar materiales de construcción: madera, zinc, clavos, postes de madera y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es tener una vivienda de concreto y velar por la formación personal y profesional de su hijo.
texts.en: Leonel Francisco is a native of Puerto Cabezas. He is 29 years old, married, and has one nine-year-old son, who is in third grade. For many years he has lived in his parents' house. He is requesting this loan to buy construction materials such as wood, corrugated metal roofing and wood posts and to pay for the labor to build a wooden stilt house. He hopes to give his family their own, safe home. His dream is to have a house made of concrete and to look after his son's personal and professional education.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as wood, corrugated metal roofing and wood posts and to pay for the labor to build a wooden stilt house.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: Es originario de Waspam, tiene 31 años de edad, casado con 2 hijos menores de edad, su esposa trabaja en el Gobierno Regional. Con el propósito de mejorar el techo de su vivienda solicita  financiamiento para comprar: zinc, clavos, madera y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es tener una vivienda que le brinde las condiciones adecuadas a su familia.
texts.en: He originates from Waspam, is 31 years-old, and is married with 2 underage children. His wife works with the regional government. With the purpose of improving the roof of his home, he requests a loan to purchase zinc, nails, wood, and to cover the costs of labor. His dream is to have a home that grants his family adequate living conditions.

loans.use: to improve the roof in his home

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en: Evelyn is an 18-year-old, businesswoman living in the Shurugwi District of Zimbabwe with her parents and siblings. Evelyn has been selling clothes to all age groups for six months now. She was encouraged by her mentor to start her business, so that she could become a role model to the other young women in her community. When she is not working in her business, Evelyn serves as a Cama (Camfed’s alumni network) member volunteering in schools within the community. With the requested loan, Evelyn intends to make bulk purchases of clothes to boost her sales. With the additional profits she hopes to expand into a large retail business, create employment for people in her community, and provide for her siblings.

loans.use: to purchase bulk clothes to increase her stocks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more grocery products for her shop.

loans.name: Nerisa

texts.en:
Nerisa is a 29-year-old, hardworking married woman, who supports a family of five children ages 16, 14, 12, 10 and 5 years old.  Her spouse, Leonard, adds additional income to the family.
 
Nerisa has been operating a tailoring business for a period of nine years earning an income of KES 10,000.  She is now servicing her sixth loan of KES 30,000 with VisionFund Kenya, and intends to use this amount to purchase new and additional stocks of materials for her business.  The profit she earns will be used to educate her children. Nerisa hopes to be able to further their education to higher levels, and to become a successful businesswoman to serve her community better.

loans.use: to purchase new materials to make new cloths to her clients.

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna is one of those women in our republic that has devoted a good portion of her life to school, children, and teaching. She graduated from Vanadzor State Pedagogical Institute in Methodology of Elementary Classes. She has 30 years of work experience in this field and continues her teaching activities. She teaches elementary classes and is a kind and wise woman who is greatly respected and loved by her pupils and colleagues.  

She creates lesson plans that include active games, quizzes, and conversations well suited with the lesson’s theme of that day. 

Susanna is married and lives with her lovely family in the city of Vanadzor  of Lori region. 

Susanna greatly needs this loan to buy a computer and professional literature to gain new knowledge and information that will be very useful in her teaching occupation and for her pupils.

loans.use: to buy a computer and professional methodological literature.

loans.name: Raen Group

texts.en:
Abir is the featured representative of the Raen group. She and the other group members are best friends and they request a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua.

Abir is a 39-year-old married mother of two whose husband is a carpenter and woks also as a security guard for a living. She has her own home business specialized in preparing and selling Mouneh. Abir decided to start this business six years ago. After a challenging start to her business, Abir has seen lots of success with her business and is pleased with her progress. 

She has requested a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to pay for her children's school tuition fees. In the future she hopes to save money  to expand her business and open her own Mouneh selling shop. Abir is standing on right side, while Rania is on left and Raya is wearing the pink and white top.

loans.use: to pay for her children's  school tuition fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more grocery products

loans.name: Christine
